K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:434b-1: nando pa nanda n'a ga r'a dza da ma na s'u tra /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-1: dga' bo nyer dga' 'dul ba'i mdo /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-2: 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-3: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na; bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-4: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dus gcig na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa thos nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-6: btsun pa dge slong lnga brgya dang bcas pa sang nang par bdag gi khyim du gdugs tshod la 'byon par zhu zhes mgron du gnyer to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gnang nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-8: de'i nyin mo'i lhag ma dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-9: mtshan mo'i mtha' 'das nas tho rangs kyi dus su stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams la thugs kyis rnam par dgongs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-10: de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyer dga' zhes bya ba ye shes kyi sgo nas mngon du byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-11: de la nges par legs pa'i sa bon yod dam zhes brtags pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-12: 'di ni log par lta ba can dkon mchog gsum la dad pa med par gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-13: gzigs nas gang zhig 'di ni log bar lta ba las rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-14: 'dul bar byed pa gnas brtan chen po moo dgal gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435a-15: de nas mtshan mo tho rangs kyi dus su sku'i byi dor mdzad nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-0: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bos @435b te bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-2: dge slong lnga brgya dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'jig rten du gshegs so zhes ston cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-3: des btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal? lo zhes gsol nas dge slong rnams la don de smras so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-4: de'i nyi ma la dga' bo nyer dags nyer bsdogs byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-5: de lha'i rin po che'i steng du skyil krung gis gnas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-6: lha'i gdugs dkar po bzung ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-8: klu mo gar byed cing klu'i 'khor g-yog du mas bskor te lha'i snod nye bar bzhag nas bza' ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-9: btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa la rtog par byed do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po ji lta bar gzigs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-11: de ltar byas pa gzigs nas de'i mgo bo'i steng gi bla bres kyi steng nyid nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-12: bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgya dang bcas pas gshegs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-13: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i bar mngon sum du gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-14: de'i tshe de'i dus na klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyer dga' de lta bu'i gzugs kyis sdig pa'i lta bar lhung ba lta ba ngan pa'i sems skyes so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-15: dge sbyong mgo reg 'di nga'i steng nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jig rten gyi gnas su gshegs par 'gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-16: 'di ni de lta nas nga'i mgo bo la rkang pa'i rdul mgo bo'i steng du lhung bar byed pas 'gro du mi ster ro snyam ste /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:435b-17: langs nas ri rab kyi rtsa bar song ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-0: rang gi gzugs bor te ri bo mchog @436a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-1: rab steng 'og thams cad rang gi lus kyis lan bdun bkris nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-2: steng du gdengs ka byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-3: sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyis mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-6: sngar bzhin gnas 'di'i phyogs su 'dug na ri'i mchog rab mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-7: ri bo mchog rab 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-8: sum cu rtsa gsum mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-9: rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-10: rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang gi steng gi rgyal mtshan mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-13: da ni ri bo mchog rab mi mthong bar 'gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-16: 'di ni klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyer dga' zhes bya ba khyed rnams la khros par gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-17: ri bo mchog rab lan bdun du lus kyi dkris nas steng du gdengs kas bsgribs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-18: mun pa mun nag tu byas nas gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba ma byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-23: de nas tshe dang ldan pa bzang ldan dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-24: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-25: gro rim bzhin du dge slong thams cad kyis zhus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba ma byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-0: thams @436b cad kyis rjes su gnas brtan chen po moo dgal gyi bus btsun pa bdag gis gdul bar bgyi'am /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-4: ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba byin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-5: gnas brtan rang gi lus bor la klu'i rgyal po'i lus chen por sprul te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-6: dga' bo nyer dga'i lus kyi steng du lan bcu bzhi lus kyis dkri ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-7: de'i gdengs ka'i steng du rang gi gdengs ka bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-8: ri bo mchog rab dang bcas pa thams cad non cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-10: gnas brtan moo dgal gyi bus de bzhin du byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-11: de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyer dags kha rlangs kyi du ba btang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-12: gnas brtan gyis kyang khyed kyi lus la kha rlangs kyi du ba yod la nged la med pa yin nam zhes kha rlangs btang ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-13: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyer dga'i du bas gnas brtan la gnod par ma gyur ro //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-14: gnas brtan gyi kha rlangs kyi du bas klu'i rgyal po la gnod par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-16: gnas brtan gyis khyed kyi lus la 'bar ba yod pa bzhin nged la med dam zhes 'bar bar byas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-17: klu'i rgyal po'i me 'od kyis gnas brtan la gnod par ma gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-18: gnas brtan gyi me 'od kyis klu'i rgyal po la gnod par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:436b-20: 'di ni bdag gi lus ri bo mchog rab dar bcas pa nges par mnan nas du ba dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-2: khyed gang yin zhes dris so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-3: bdag moo dgal zhes bya ba'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-4: btsun pa rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-5: gnas brtan gyis klu'i lus dor nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-6: de'i rna ba g-yas pa'i bu ga nas zhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-7: rna ba g-yon pa'i bu ga nas 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-8: yang rna ba g-yon pa'i bu ga nas zhugs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-9: rnab g-yas pa'i bu ga nas 'thon no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-10: de bzhin du sna g-yas pa'i bu ga nas zhugs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-11: sna g-yon pa'i bu ga nas 'thon te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-12: yang sna g-yon pa'i bu ga nas zhugs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-13: sna g-yas pa'i bu ga nas 'thon no; ;de nas klu'i rgyal po'i kha gdangs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-15: gsus pa'i nang du mdun rgyab tu yang dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis moo dgal rdzu 'phrul cher yid la gyis shig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-18: klu rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes bka' stsal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-21: bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa dang; mang du byas pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-25: 'dris par byas pas legs par brtsams so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-27: dga' bo nyer dga' lta zhog /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-28: dga' bo nyer dga' dang mtshungs par brgya'i tshogs dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437a-30: 'bum gyi tshogs kyang bdag gis gdul bar nus so zhes gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-1: nang na rgyu ba bdag gis ma mthong ngo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-2: phyir 'byung ba'i tshe mche ba gnyis kyi bar du bza' 'o snyam nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-5: nga'i lto ba'i nang du yang dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-7: sngod pas ci bya zhes pas gnas brtan phyir byon nas gnas so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-12: gnas brtan bsam gtan bzhi po mnyam par thob pas ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu yang sna'i rlung gis bskyod par ma nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-13: de las gzhan pa'i dge slong rnams kyis dang po rnams kyis cho 'phrul thams cad byed par nus kyi /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-14: gnas 'di rnams la rab tu zhugs nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-15: bsam gtan bzhi po myur du bsgrub par mi nus so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-16: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po 'dul ba de rnams la gnang ba ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-17: klu'i rgyal po bdag gis dge slong 'di'i ba spu'i bu ga tsam yang sna'i rlung gis bskyod par ma nus pas rdzu 'phrul chen por bsams so; ;gnas brtan gyis dge slong gi gzugs dor nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-18: 'dab bzang bya khyung gi gzugs su mngon par sprul to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:437b-19: 'dab bzang gi lus de mthong nas klu'i rgyal po bros par gyur to; ;'dab bzang gi rjes su 'brel par klu'i rgyal pos rang gi gzugs dor nas bram ze'i khye'u yi gzugs su sprul to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-0: khyed la skyabs su 'gro'o zhes rjed par byed cing @438a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-1: gnas brtan gyi zhabs la phyag btsal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-2: gnas brtan gyis ston pa'i thad du shog cig /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-3: 'gro ba yin no zhes klu'i rgyal po btul nas dug med par byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du phyin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-5: klu'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-7: khyed la skyabs su 'gro'o zhes gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bka' stsal nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-9: dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa mgon med zas sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-11: btsun pa yun ring por mi 'byon pa ci zhes gsol pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-14: dga' bo nyer dga' gnyis g-yul bkye'o zhes bka' stsal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-16: su zhig pham; su zhig rgyal bar gyur zhes gsol pas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-18: moo dgal gyi bu rgyal bar gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-19: dga' bo nyer dga' pham par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-21: mgon med zas sbyin gyis btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la zhag bdun du rim pa bzhin du gdugs tshod gsol bar zhus /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-22: gnas brtan la bkur sti dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-23: bsti btang bgyid par zhus so; ;sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong lnga brgya po rnams la bkur sti dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438a-24: bsti btang zhag bdun du bgyid par 'tshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal @438b pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438b-1: dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438b-2: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyer dga' 'dul ba'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438b-3: pandi ta chen po aa nanta shr'i'i zhal snga nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438b-4: mang du thos pa'i lo tstsha ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyis gdan sa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438b-5: gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-027:438b-6: sa'i steng du nyi ma dang /
